products.title: Calcutta Stripe Seaside Blue Roman Blind
products.description: Make your window a jaw dropping centrepiece with the calcutta stripe seaside blue roman blind, a loud and proud celebration of colour. Vibrant shades of red and orange bring dazzling brightness but are calmed with gentler blues and subtle touches of green, keeping everything in make your window a jaw dropping centrepiece with the calcutta stripe seaside blue roman blind, a loud and proud celebration of colour.

products.title: Calcutta Stripe Blue Mist Roman Blind
products.description: Theres a wonderfully earthy, natural tone to the colours in this subtly stunning blind, the colours of a babbling brook bringing a sense of calm to a space. Pastel blue like icy water, sandy tones and pebbly grey and taupe, all come together in a higgledy piggledy horizontal s theres a wonderfully earthy, natural tone to the colours in this subtly stunning blind, the colours of a babbling brook bringing a sense of calm to a space.
